prompts.prompt:
create marks calculator in this there is a input box of subject name/final marks (out of 100)/internal marks (out of 25)/midterm mark (out of 50) and there is button of add subject and remove too , 

here's breakdown to calculate to pass and grade one:

mid sem marks convert into 25
end sem marks convert into 50
internal marks remain same as 25

after that if marks;
less than 40 then fail (f grade)
40: p grade
41-50: D grade
51-60: C grade
61-70: B grade
71-80: A grade
81-100: O grade
the text box text in white so not visible make it black
make some style using tailwandcss components of input box also label that too
input box text is white make it black
make all added subjects shown in right side in table view layout and subject adding will be in left side (also update if marks is exact 40 then pass text shown)

there is one misunderstand by you if exact 40 then pass and less than 40 means fail and remain will same as i previous given grade 

also add one condition if (end sem less than 35 then fail too it does't matter the end of total it 40+ of combine of internal and mid sem

if possible limit input box for marks like for internal max 25 and mid sem max 50 and final mark max 100

ok now add remove option in table view too, also update labels of marks input box
final marks (out of 100)
internal marks (out of 25)
mid sem marks (out of 50)
this design is good on tablet and pc/desktop but in mobile need to check desktop version so its not responsive make it responsive design
its perfect for greater than 601 width but below this width display size not responsive not showing all text/box below this width so make perfect for all display sizes

you changed in desktop , added scroll bar type table there is no need in desktop mode so remove and make that one in mobile size one and reduce input box size in mobile and right too so all content show perfect and become responsive
add one column of total final converted marks too (that one was considered to decide grade one total) in the left side of grade column

add one button titled as surprise me that open new popup and in this popup i need this feauture:
predict all scenario to pass in exam (so there is a show all possiblities based on internal marks and mid sem marks ) to get pass and end how many marks needed in final exam to get 40+ give possible all scenario (make it separate all so you need all textbox again to enter marks and all make sure textbox text is in black ) also close button to close this popup
